headline.main: HILL 609 BATTERED BY AMERICAN GUNS; Artillery Beat Day-Long Tattoo of Destruction on Firmly Held Djebel Tahent MINOR POSITIONS TAKEN Stubbornly Defended Height Called 'Devil Mountain' by Officers Attacking It

lead_paragraph: WITH THE UNITED STATES SECOND CORPS, In Tunisia, April 30 (Delayed) -- All day long big guns thundered through the narrow valleys as massed American artillery played a tattoo of death and destruction on Hill 609 -- Djebel Tahent -- which bars further progress by the infantry north and east of Sidi Nsir toward the Tunis plain.
